Control Name: CRYPTOGRAPHIC KEY ESTABLISHMENT AND MANAGEMENT | AVAILABILITY
Control Statement: The organization maintains availability of information in the event of the loss of cryptographic keys by users.Supplemental Guidance:  Escrowing of encryption keys is a common practice for ensuring availability in the event of loss of keys (e.g., due to forgotten passphrase).
